cz.kinst.jakub.diploma.offloading.utils

Class OffloadingConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.kinst.jakub.diploma.offloading.utils.OffloadingConfig

  • public class OffloadingConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Offloading configuration - mostly time period values for DEECo components and ensembles

    --------------------------- Created by Jakub Kinst 2015 E-mail: jakub@kinst.cz
